data.text: Love righteousness, ye that be judges of the earth:
For he will be found of them that tempt him not;
For froward thoughts separate from God:
For into a malicious soul wisdom shall not enter:
For the holy spirit of discipline will flee deceit,
For wisdom is a loving spirit;
For the Spirit of the Lord filleth the world:
Therefore he that speaketh unrighteous things cannot be hidden:
For inquisition shall be made into the counsels of the ungodly:
For the ear of jealousy heareth all things:
Therefore beware of murmuring, which is unprofitable;
Seek not death in the error of your life:
For he created all things, that they might have their being:
But ungodly men with their works and words called it to them:
